result.namespace_description: List secret scanning alerts for an enterprise

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: enterprise
fields.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

fields.name: state
fields.description: Set to open or resolved to only list secret scanning alerts in a specific state.

fields.name: secret_type
fields.description:
A comma-separated list of secret types to return. By default all secret types are returned.
See "Secret scanning patterns"
for a complete list of secret types (API slug).

fields.name: resolution
fields.description: A comma-separated list of resolutions. Only secret scanning alerts with one of these resolutions are listed. Valid resolutions are false_positive, wont_fix, revoked, pattern_edited, pattern_deleted or used_in_tests.

fields.name: per_page
fields.description: Results per page (max 100)Default: 30

fields.name: before
fields.description: A cursor, as given in the Link header. If specified, the query only searches for events before this cursor.

fields.name: after
fields.description: A cursor, as given in the Link header. If specified, the query only searches for events after this cursor.

result.namespace_description: List secret scanning alerts for an organization

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: state
fields.description: Set to open or resolved to only list secret scanning alerts in a specific state.

fields.name: secret_type
fields.description:
A comma-separated list of secret types to return. By default all secret types are returned.
See "Secret scanning patterns"
for a complete list of secret types (API slug).

fields.name: resolution
fields.description: A comma-separated list of resolutions. Only secret scanning alerts with one of these resolutions are listed. Valid resolutions are false_positive, wont_fix, revoked, pattern_edited, pattern_deleted or used_in_tests.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page number of the results to fetch.Default: 1

fields.name: per_page
fields.description: Results per page (max 100)Default: 30

result.namespace_description: List secret scanning alerts for a repository

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: state
fields.description: Set to open or resolved to only list secret scanning alerts in a specific state.

fields.name: secret_type
fields.description:
A comma-separated list of secret types to return. By default all secret types are returned.
See "Secret scanning patterns"
for a complete list of secret types (API slug).

fields.name: resolution
fields.description: A comma-separated list of resolutions. Only secret scanning alerts with one of these resolutions are listed. Valid resolutions are false_positive, wont_fix, revoked, pattern_edited, pattern_deleted or used_in_tests.

fields.name: page
fields.description: Page number of the results to fetch.Default: 1

fields.name: per_page
fields.description: Results per page (max 100)Default: 30

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: alert_number
fields.description: The number that identifies an alert. You can find this at the end of the URL for a code scanning alert within GitHub, and in the number field in the response from the GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/code-scanning/alerts operation.

fields.name: accept
fields.description: Setting toapplication/vnd.github.v3+json is recommended.

fields.name: alert_number
fields.description: The number that identifies an alert. You can find this at the end of the URL for a code scanning alert within GitHub, and in the number field in the response from the GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/code-scanning/alerts operation.

fields.name: state
fields.description: Required. Sets the state of the secret scanning alert. Can be either open or resolved. You must provide resolution when you set the state to resolved.

fields.name: resolution
fields.description: Required when the state is resolved. The reason for resolving the alert. Can be one of false_positive, wont_fix, revoked, or used_in_tests.

fields.name: page
